articles.author: Jessica Mendoza
articles.title: Is 'oat-zempic' a substitute for Ozempic? A dietitian weighs in - Good Morning America
articles.description: Some people are trying a meal replacement drink with oats to lose weight.
articles.content: With the use of drugs like Ozempic, Wegovy and Mounjaro growing in popularity for weight loss, some people are trying to get similar results using a lower-cost and easily accessible option, dry oats.… [+3816 chars]
